name: Payment Gateway Account-wallee_payment_method_id
label: Wallee Payment Method ID
description: Wallee Payment Method Configuration ID (e.g., 440350 for Credit Card, specific ID for TWINT). Leave empty to use the first available method.

name: POS Profile-wallee_terminal_payment_mode
label: Wallee Terminal Payment Mode
description: When this Mode of Payment is selected in POS, the Wallee terminal payment dialog opens automatically.
